channel.title: Big Problem with Source
channel.description:
[font=arial black]Hi there. I have come here because I have some issues with my source im using. First off... the big problem.[/font] [font=arial]At the duel arena... when your opponent is killed he drops all his items! [/font] [font=arial]Issue 2 & 3: Changing the bank titles for copyright reasons & Money/Items do not turn green after 10 million[/font] [font=arial]Issue 4: When trading another player alot of items they just go off the trade screen.[/font]
Please... any help is appreciated... and i thank you for reading. :)
Edit: The Source is 2006remade btw incase you need to know that

item.title: Big Problem with Source
item.dc:creator: @InfusedScape InfusedScape
item.description:
@InfusedScape wrote:

I have no idea what revision it is, but I will try my best to help. Check either client.java or player.java and look for “isinwild” or something like that, and then do a quick search for “duel”. If there is no duel then you can take the isinwild coordinates, make a new void for “isinduel” and use make it not drop items.

Read full topic
